name: Healthify Heart Guard
description: Comprehensive profile for heart health assessment.
testsIncluded: Lipid Profile, Troponin I, CK-MB, ECG

name: Wellness Check-Up (Basic)
description: Basic health screening for general well-being.
testsIncluded: Complete Blood Count (CBC), Blood Glucose (Fasting), Liver Function Test (LFT)

name: Diabetic Profile
testsIncluded: HbA1c, Blood Glucose (Fasting), Kidney Function Test (KFT)

name: Comprehensive Wellness
description: Full-body health check-up with multiple parameters.
testsIncluded: Complete Blood Count (CBC), Lipid Profile, Liver Function Test (LFT), Kidney Function Test (KFT), Thyroid Profile, Vitamin D (25-Hydroxy)

name: Anemia Profile
description: Evaluates causes and severity of anemia.
testsIncluded: Complete Blood Count (CBC), Iron Studies

name: Thyroid Health Package
testsIncluded: Thyroid Profile, Anti-Thyroid Peroxidase (Anti-TPO), Thyroglobulin

name: Liver Health Screen
description: Assesses liver function and related markers.
testsIncluded: Liver Function Test (LFT), Gamma-Glutamyl Transferase (GGT), Alpha-Fetoprotein (AFP)

name: Kidney Care Package
testsIncluded: Kidney Function Test (KFT), Microalbuminuria, Creatinine Clearance

name: Cardiac Risk Assessment
testsIncluded: Lipid Profile, Homocysteine, C-Reactive Protein (CRP), Troponin I

name: Inflammatory Marker Panel
testsIncluded: C-Reactive Protein (CRP), Erythrocyte Sedimentation Rate (ESR), Complement C3

name: Bone Health Profile
testsIncluded: Vitamin D (25-Hydroxy), Calcium, Phosphorus, Bone Alkaline Phosphatase

name: Women’s Health Check
testsIncluded: Thyroid Profile, Estrogen (Estradiol), Progesterone, CA-125

name: Men’s Health Screen
testsIncluded: Testosterone (Total), PSA (Prostate-Specific Antigen), Lipid Profile

name: Pediatric Health Profile
testsIncluded: Complete Blood Count (CBC), Blood Glucose (Fasting), Iron Studies

name: Senior Citizen Package
testsIncluded: Complete Blood Count (CBC), Lipid Profile, Liver Function Test (LFT), Kidney Function Test (KFT), Thyroid Profile, Vitamin D (25-Hydroxy), PSA (Prostate-Specific Antigen)

name: Prenatal Profile
testsIncluded: Blood Glucose (Fasting), Hemoglobin Electrophoresis, Rubella IgG

name: Postnatal Recovery Package
testsIncluded: Complete Blood Count (CBC), Liver Function Test (LFT), Thyroid Profile

name: Stress Hormone Panel
testsIncluded: Cortisol (Serum), Adrenocorticotropic Hormone (ACTH), DHEA-Sulfate

name: Autoimmune Screen
testsIncluded: Anti-Nuclear Antibody (ANA), Rheumatoid Factor (RF), Complement C4

name: Infectious Disease Panel
testsIncluded: Hepatitis B Surface Antigen (HBsAg), Hepatitis C Antibody, HIV RNA, Syphilis Test (RPR)

name: Viral Infection Profile
testsIncluded: Cytomegalovirus (CMV) PCR, Epstein-Barr Virus (EBV) PCR, Varicella-Zoster Virus (VZV) IgG

name: Tumor Marker Panel
testsIncluded: CA-125, CEA (Carcinoembryonic Antigen), Alpha-Fetoprotein (AFP)

name: Metabolic Syndrome Profile

name: Gastrointestinal Health Check

name: Neurological Health Screen

name: Allergy and Sensitivity Panel

name: Vitamin and Mineral Profile
testsIncluded: Vitamin D (25-Hydroxy), Vitamin B12, Iron Studies, Zinc (Serum)

name: Executive Health Check

name: Menopause Health Package
